message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

Reasoning: The paper deals with generating descriptions of images or videos, which is a problem in both Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) communities. The paper also proposes a model that learns to ground (localize) mentioned characters and do visual co-reference resolution, which involves machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed model on the MPII Movie Description dataset, which is a multimedia dataset (cs.MM).
